positions.subtitle: airtel
positions.description: Designation : Lead - Provisioning & NPT of West Bengal CircleRCA, BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE, AND PROVISIONING LEAD– 1) Successfully introduced Power BI to deep dive and forecast Engineer’s visit vs Resolved on Phone volume MoM, saving costs (DTH process in Airtel Black). 2) Driving C-SAT enhancement initiatives and reducing CPC (calls per customer). Awarded ‘Win with Experience’ in FY'23 Q3 from Customer Experience & Marketing Director of Bharti Airtel for consistent delight scores in West Bengal Circle, including Andaman and Nicobar Islands (Prepaid Process). CPC reduction best proposition chosen for national replication. 3) Collaborating with LOB stakeholders to innovate and drive retention tools for MNP (Postpaid process).LEAD NPT (New Product Testing) – 1) Overseeing comprehensive UAT across various LOBs (Postpaid, Prepaid, and Broadband) in sprints. Supporting new launches and existing product changes. 2) Conducting VAS product testing, identifying process gaps, and proposing scalable solutions to stakeholders and the Engineering team for major product changes like digital eSIM activation journey, Accretive Validity.
positions.title: Lead Analyst (Sr Exec)
positions.description_html:
Designation : Lead - Provisioning & NPT of West Bengal Circle
RCA, BUSINESS INTELLIGENCE, AND PROVISIONING LEAD–
1) Successfully introduced Power BI to deep dive and forecast Engineer’s visit vs Resolved on Phone volume MoM, saving costs (DTH process in Airtel Black).
2) Driving C-SAT enhancement initiatives and reducing CPC (calls per customer). Awarded ‘Win with Experience’ in FY'23 Q3 from Customer Experience & Marketing Director of Bharti Airtel for consistent delight scores in West Bengal Circle, including Andaman and Nicobar Islands (Prepaid Process). CPC reduction best proposition chosen for national replication.
3) Collaborating with LOB stakeholders to innovate and drive retention tools for MNP (Postpaid
process).
LEAD NPT (New Product Testing) –
1) Overseeing comprehensive UAT across various LOBs (Postpaid, Prepaid, and Broadband) in sprints. Supporting new launches and existing product changes.
2) Conducting VAS product testing, identifying process gaps, and proposing scalable solutions to stakeholders and the Engineering team for major product changes like digital eSIM activation journey, Accretive Validity.

experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: Work closely with onshore stakeholders, performing analysis to develop strategic insights & solutions on large client database to support Pricing Leaders. Support another team in setting up & implementing Sales cloud in Salesforce. Also deliver customer ad hoc requests, overcoming challenges at any given time.KEY PROJECTS -1) REPORTING, MANAGEMENT AND PROCESS AUTOMATION –•Create weekly/ monthly/ quarterly reports from raw data by collecting to monitor price performance and identify business drivers which help improve price year on year. Creating pricing strategies on which price revisions are decided to support Pricing Leaders with Order Price Index exercise.•Conduct deep dives and analysis in a project team that follows a structured Agile management methodology (eg. Sprint planning, Kanban boards, user story updates, weekly status meetings, reporting).•Wrote a multitude of Excel VBA scripts to extract, compile and standardize raw data into a clean entry format in an ETL process that reduced 144 hours of Extra Processingannually.•Engage in continuous process improvement activities through automation using advanced MS Excel and VBA.2) SALESFORCE SALES CLOUD IMPLEMENTATION –•Provide support in setup, training and execution of Sales cloud in SFDC by customizing various standard objects like Accounts, Contacts, Cases, Leads, Products, Reports and Dashboards.•Provide confidential security at different levels in Sales cloud.•Participate in daily scrum meeting with vendor, sales and internal stuff.•Participate in peer review sessions throughout design and development phases.•Customise the Dashboards to track the usage for productivity and performance of business centres and their sales team.•Experience in Agile/Scrum writing user stories and follow the SDLC through user story acceptance.• Proposed new innovative approach that improved the automation of Sales process, that is 20% faster than earlier process.
experience.description_html: Work closely with onshore stakeholders, performing analysis to develop strategic insights & solutions on large client database to support Pricing Leaders. Support another team in setting up & implementing Sales cloud in Salesforce. Also deliver customer ad hoc requests, overcoming challenges at any given time.KEY PROJECTS -1) REPORTING, MANAGEMENT AND PROCESS AUTOMATION –•Create weekly/ monthly/ quarterly reports from raw data by collecting to monitor price performance and identify business drivers which help improve price year on year. Creating pricing strategies on which price revisions are decided to support Pricing Leaders with Order Price Index exercise.•Conduct deep dives and analysis in a project team that follows a structured Agile management methodology (eg. Sprint planning, Kanban boards, user story updates, weekly status meetings, reporting).•Wrote a multitude of Excel VBA scripts to extract, compile and standardize raw data into a clean entry format in an ETL process that reduced 144 hours of Extra Processingannually.•Engage in continuous process improvement activities through automation using advanced MS Excel and VBA.2) SALESFORCE SALES CLOUD IMPLEMENTATION –•Provide support in setup, training and execution of Sales cloud in SFDC by customizing various standard objects like Accounts, Contacts, Cases, Leads, Products, Reports and Dashboards.•Provide confidential security at different levels in Sales cloud.•Participate in daily scrum meeting with vendor, sales and internal stuff.•Participate in peer review sessions throughout design and development phases.•Customise the Dashboards to track the usage for productivity and performance of business centres and their sales team.•Experience in Agile/Scrum writing user stories and follow the SDLC through user story acceptance.• Proposed new innovative approach that improved the automation of Sales process, that is 20% faster than earlier process.

experience.title: Operations Intern
experience.description: 1) Increased 20% workflow efficiency of the sales team by reconfiguring the sales cloud app in Salesforce lightning.2) Successfully implemented Salesforce, improving customer satisfaction index and retention statistics by gathering information on user feedback and reporting the same to the respective teams.3) Audited and onboarded a total of 2100 SME and large enterprise recruiters in 2 months in CRM.

experience.title: Business Development Associate Intern
experience.description: 1) Managed a team of 16 interns from onboarding them to formulating a new promotion model and loyalty system that increased sales by 27% in less than 2 weeks.2) Exceeded the monthly performance goal by generating a total of 255 leads for both B and C sides, ranking 3rd among top 45 interns.
